metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

Migrate Classic Application Insights to Log Analytic Workspace which is retiring by 29 Febraury 2024. Use 'Log Analytic Workspace-->Properties' blade having 'Resource ID' property value. This is a fully qualified resourceId which is in format '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/{workspaceName}'

metadata.title: Domain ASIM Enrichment - DomainTools Iris Enrich
metadata.description: Given a domain or set of domains associated with an alert return all Iris Enrich data for those domains and adds the enrichment data to the custom table.
metadata.prerequisites: A DomainTools API Key provisioned for Iris Enrich. Visit https://www.domaintools.com/integrations to request a trial key.

body.message: DNSDB Co-Located IP Addresses for IP: @{items('For_each')?['Address']} (From Date: @{variables('start_date')}, To Date: @{variables('end_date')})@{body('Co_located_Ip_Address_table')}

DNSDB Co-Located IP Addresses for IP: @{items('For_each')?['Address']} (From Date: @{variables('start_date')}, To Date: @{variables('end_date')})
No Records Found

metadata.title: DomainTools DNSDB Co-Located IP Addresses
metadata.description: This playbook uses the Farsight DNSDB connector to automatically enrich IP Addresses found in the Microsoft Sentinel incidents. This lookup will identify all the IPs that are co-located (based on Domain) based on the Offense Source value. This would be set of IPs that also shared the same Domain as the originating IP address.
metadata.prerequisites: A DomainTools API Key provisioned for Iris Investigate. Visit https://www.domaintools.com/integrations to request a trial key.

body.message: DNSDB Co-Located Domains for Domain: @{items('For_each')}(From Date: @{variables('start_date')}, To Date: @{variables('end_date')})@{body('Co_located_domains_table')}

DNSDB Co-Located Domains for Domain: @{items('For_each')}(From Date: @{variables('start_date')}, To Date: @{variables('end_date')})
No Records Found

metadata.title: DomainTools DNSDB Co-Located Hosts
metadata.description: This playbook uses the Farsight DNSDB connector to automatically enrich Domain's found in the Microsoft Sentinel incidents. This use case describes the desire to easily identify Hosts that are co-located (based on Address) based on the input of a domain and a given point in time. The response would be a set of domains that also shared the same IP address as the originating domain name at the given point in time.
metadata.prerequisites: A DomainTools API Key provisioned for Iris Investigate. Visit https://www.domaintools.com/integrations to request a trial key.

body.message:
DNSDB Historical Address for Domain: @{items('For_each')}(From Date: @{variables('start_date')}, To Date: @{variables('end_date')})
@{body('Historical_IPS_table')}

DNSDB Historical Address for Domain: @{items('For_each')}(From Date: @{variables('start_date')}, To Date: @{variables('end_date')})
No Records Found

metadata.title: DomainTools DNSDB Historical IP Addresses
metadata.description: This playbook uses the Farsight DNSDB connector to automatically enrich IP Addresses found in the Microsoft Sentinel incidents. This use case describes the desire to identify all Addresses used as DNS A records for a given Host based on a time window from a starting and stopping point in time.
metadata.prerequisites: A DomainTools API Key provisioned for Iris Investigate. Visit https://www.domaintools.com/integrations to request a trial key.

body.message:
DNSDB Historical Hosts for IP: @{items('For_each')?['Address']} (From Date:@{variables('start_date')}, To Date:@{variables('end_Date')})
@{body('Historical_Hosts_Table')}

DNSDB Historical Hosts for IP: @{items('For_each')?['Address']} (From Date:@{variables('start_date')}, To Date:@{variables('end_Date')})
No Records Found

metadata.title: DomainTools DNSDB Historical Hosts
metadata.description: This playbook uses the Farsight DNSDB connector to automatically enrich Domain's found in the Microsoft Sentinel incidents. This use case describes the desire to identify all Hosts that resolved to a given Address based on a time window from a starting and stopping point in time.
metadata.prerequisites: A DomainTools API Key provisioned for Iris Investigate. Visit https://www.domaintools.com/integrations to request a trial key.

body.message: Parsed WhoIs Referral Servers for IP Address: @{variables('ip_address')}@{body('parsed_whois_other_properties_table')}
Parsed WhoIs Referral Servers for IP Address: @{variables('ip_address')}@{body('parsed_whois_refferal_servers_table')}

metadata.title: IP Enrichment - DomainTools Parsed Whois
metadata.description: This playbook uses the DomainTools Parsed Whois API. Given a ip address or set of ip addresses associated with an incident, return Whois information data for the extracted ip addresess as comments to the incident.
metadata.prerequisites: A DomainTools API Key provisioned for Iris Investigate. Visit https://www.domaintools.com/integrations to request a trial key.

metadata.title: Domain Enrichment - DomainTools Iris Enrich
metadata.description: Given a domain or set of domains associated with an incident return all Iris Enrich data for those domains as comments in the incident.
metadata.prerequisites: A DomainTools API Key provisioned for Iris Enrich. Visit https://www.domaintools.com/integrations to request a trial key.

metadata.title: Domain Enrichment - DomainTools Iris Investigate
metadata.description: Given a domain or set of domains associated with an incident return all Iris Investigate data for those domains as comments in the incident.
metadata.prerequisites: A DomainTools API Key provisioned for Iris Investigate. Visit https://www.domaintools.com/integrations to request a trial key.

properties.description: DomainToolsDNS Data Parser with template version 3.0.2

properties.query:
DomainToolsDomainEnrichment_CL
| extend EventVendor = "DomainTools"
| extend EventProduct = "Iris Enrich"
| extend EventSchema = "Dns"
| extend EventSchemaVersion = "0.1.7"
| extend EventCount = 1
| extend EventType = "Query"
| extend EventSubType = "response"
| extend
	EventStartTime = TimeGenerated,
	EventEndTime = TimeGenerated,
	Dvc = EventVendor,
	EventResult = 'Success',
    SrcGeoCountry = column_ifexists('Contact_Country_Code_s', ''),
    Domain = column_ifexists('Domain_s', ''),
    IpAddr = column_ifexists('IP_Address_s', ''),
    DnsResponseIpCountry = column_ifexists('IP_Country_s', ''),
    SrcRiskLevel = column_ifexists('Risk_Score_d', '')
 | project
    TimeGenerated,
    EventVendor,
    EventProduct,
    EventType,
    SrcGeoCountry,
    Domain,
    IpAddr,
    DnsResponseIpCountry,
    SrcRiskLevel

DomainToolsDomainEnrichment_CL
| extend EventVendor = "DomainTools"
| extend EventProduct = "Iris Enrich"
| extend EventSchema = "Dns"
| extend EventSchemaVersion = "0.1.7"
| extend EventCount = 1
| extend EventType = "Query"
| extend EventSubType = "response"
| extend
	EventStartTime = TimeGenerated,
	EventEndTime = TimeGenerated,
	Dvc = EventVendor,
	EventResult = 'Success',
    SrcGeoCountry = column_ifexists('Contact_Country_Code_s', ''),
    Domain = column_ifexists('Domain_s', ''),
    IpAddr = column_ifexists('IP_Address_s', ''),
    DnsResponseIpCountry = column_ifexists('IP_Country_s', ''),
    SrcRiskLevel = column_ifexists('Risk_Score_d', '')
 | project
    TimeGenerated,
    EventVendor,
    EventProduct,
    EventType,
    SrcGeoCountry,
    Domain,
    IpAddr,
    DnsResponseIpCountry,
    SrcRiskLevel

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: Please refer to the following before installing the solution:

â€¢ Review the solution Release Notes

â€¢ There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

The Domaintools Iris investigate solution for Microsoft Sentinel contains Playbooks that can help Enrich domain & investigate domain, domain risk score, Malicious tags, URL's and DNS from Domain tools. This enriched / investigated information can help drive better analysis in security Operations.

Parsers: 1, Function Apps: 1, Playbooks: 8

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
